subject: PGA Championship
Golf
lead_paragraph: Jim Furyk and Adam Scott posted rounds of 65 to share the lead after the first day of the P.G.A. Championship at Oak Hill Country Club in Pittsford, N.Y.
snippet: Jim Furyk and Adam Scott posted rounds of 65 to share the lead after the first day of the P.G.A. Championship at Oak Hill Country Club in Pittsford, N.Y.
